text:
Alastair Campbell - The government & the media have a massive responsibilities to be setting out the truth about what's going on... as they're losing sight of the scale of the catastrophe that's unfolding..

#Ridge #marr #coronavirus @campbellclaret https://t.co/4FgXRhxShu
